safetyTips: Contactless deliveries or collections Please enquire directly about other safety measures.
name: Big Pan Foods
description: Now delivering lockdown street food takeout including our signature paellas (vegan/chicken/seafood) and coming soon our famous South African curries/bunny chows and barbecue summer wraps. Send us a DM on socials (Instagram, Facebook or Twitter)/email/text to place orders for weekend delivery Sat/Sun 4-6pm.
